trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Willits
There were no other sightings in Willits on or around April 9th 2008
divs: sighting detailsokay first off i live in norhern ca. in the mountains. i star gaze all the time and know the flight patterns for my area. last night my husband noticed a very bright white\yellow moving star.(iknow venus, and this was not venus)it made an eliptical orbit.(kinda like a j) then... it turned into a plane!! i'm not kidding we were watching through binoculars and all the lights dimmed when my husband screamed "it's shifting" in the next momemt all we saw was something resembling a standard aircraft. very strange. there was no sound and it was not a flight pattern used before.
